metadata.title: CVE-2017-7203 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) was discovered in ZoneMinder before 1.30.2.The vulnerability exists due to insufficient filtration of user-supplieddata (postLoginQuery) passed to the"ZoneMinder-master/web/skins/classic/views/js/postlogin.js.php" URL. Anattacker could execute arbitrary HTML and script code in a browser in thecontext of the vulnerable website.

criterions.comment: zoneminder: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
